title: Richard Miller Discusses the Fed (Audio)
itunes:title: Richard Miller Discusses the Fed (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Richard Miller\u0010Journalist\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss his story on White House Senior Economic Adviser Gary Cohn emerging as the leading candidate to succeed Janet Yellen as Federal Reserve chair.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
